name: Burn Join Pray
description:
You press one of three buttons; Burn, Join, Pray.

Each button will trigger corresponding event. What does each event do? Everything is written on screen!

Your goal is making most score before game ends. Score is based on how many resources you have(displayed in top-right corner).

You can always resign and restart game by pressing Resign button.

Leaderboard would've been awesome but I didn't have enough time :(

Please share your high score in the comment!

Have fun :)
